name: slyly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that suggests that you know secrets: She grinned slyly and refused to tell me where the money came from. They look as if they're remembering a joke, grinning slyly to themselves.
in a clever way, especially when it deceives people in order to get what you want: Two police officers catch them, but the criminals slyly explain their way out of it. a slyly subversive new book for children four to eight years old See
